title: Wounds Trailer Starring Armie Hammer, Dakota Johnson: WATCH
text:
Wounds is the first film from director Babak Anvari’s since his extremely good movie Under the Shadow from 2016. This latest effort debuted at the Sundance Film Festival earlier this year, and stars Armie Hammer as a New Orleans bartender who really gets himself into trouble when he takes home a cellphone that some rowdy patrons left behind. Turns out there’s some horrible stuff in that phone, and it’s going to have a hand in ruining the lives of him and his wife (Dakota Johnson). Zazie Beetz is also there, possibly drawing Armie’s eye away from his marriage — so honestly, maybe he deserves those open sores appearing on his body and the sudden swarm of cockroaches taking over. Wounds starts streaming on Hulu October 18.

Related
description: Dakota Johnson, Zazie Beetz, and Armie Hammer star in the trailer for the horror movie Wounds, from Under the Shadow director Babak Anvari.
